Key Match Events: Asnawi Mangkuala scored the match only goal from a penalty kick in the 42nd minute
Le Pham Thanh Long received a second yellow card followed by a red card
Hernando Arri excelled defending his goal, ending up named Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: This is the second defeat in a row for the Vietnam national team, after losing to Japan 2-4.
Indonesia have to win their upcoming match against Japan to secure a spot in the last 16.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indonesia - Vietnam game saw matching levels to a large extent, but the Indonesian team succeeded in transforming penalty kick that was awarded to them after a mistake by the Vietnamese defense against the player Rafael Struijk.
Vietnam defender, Bui Hoang Viet Anh, almost scored a goal from a cross ball that he headed towards the Indonesian goal, but it passed next to the right post.
Others: Indonesia's defender #14 Asnawi Mangkualam celebrates after scoring his team's first goal from the penalty spot during the Qatar 2023 AFC Asian Cup Group D football match between Vietnam and Indonesia at the Abdullah bin Khalifa Stadium in Doha on January 19, 2024.
